DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind, randomized, multicenter, placebo-controlled study The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of HMPL-004 in patients with active moderate Crohn's Disease,compared with placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study of HMPL-004 in Subjects With Crohn's Disease
DOC.criteria: Have active confirmed Crohn's Disease (confirmed radiographically, endoscopic, or histologically), with a CDAI of 220400 at baseline screen They have received antiTNFÎ± antibody within 3 months of starting study medication, or cyclosporine, tacrolimus, thalidomide or mycophenolate mofetil within 2 months of starting study medication
